title.en: Get Upstream Catchment as GeoJSON Polygon Feature

description.en: Return the geometry of the upstream catchment of the subcatchment into which the given point falls as a GeoJSON Feature (where the geometry is a Polygon). The subcatchment itself not included.

links.title: Zenodo repository
links.description: Zenodo repository for the underlying software, always pointing to the newest release.

links.title: GitHub repository
links.description: GitHub repository containing the latest versions of the underlying software.

links.title: Galaxy tool get_upstream_dissolved
links.description: Galaxy tool that runs this process.

comment.title: Comment
comment.description: Arbitrary string that will not be processed but returned, for user"s convenience.

add_upstream_ids.title: Add upstream ids?
add_upstream_ids.description: Specify whether to add the upstream ids to the GeoJSON Feature's properties. Please write "true" or "false".

geometry_only.title: Get only the GeoJSON Geometry (in this case, a Polygon)?
geometry_only.description: Specify whether to return only a GeoJSON Geometry, instead of a GeoJSON Feature containing additional properties. Please write "true" or "false".

polygon.title: Upstream Catchment Polygon
polygon.description: Area of the upstream catchment, as a GeoJSON Feature with a Polygon geometry. If requested, contains list of ids of the subcatchments included in the upstream catchment.
